text: Yeah a custom action that calls a function with whatever we want to put in there would be awesome from a user experience perspective because right now we have to put similar actions in different places in the card.

Hey <@U02F2QPB4P8> , how is it going for you? I just saw this thread and I am curious about what you mean by
> for now the setup is just not strong enough, and we need full JS/CSS access.
We are continuously evolving our components and capabilities. So having more feedback on this from you will help us fill in the gaps, and enable you to build better extensions. Thanks, again, for all the ongoing involvement with our teams.
